Type Property# displayP3_PQ

iOS 13.4+iPadOS 13.4+Mac Catalyst 13.4+macOS 10.15.4+tvOS 13.4+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.2+

```
class let displayP3_PQ: CFString
```
